name: unlikeable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An unlikeable person is not pleasant or easy to like: He is one of the most unlikeable characters in the history of crime fiction. I have no idea why he is behaving in such an unlikeable fashion - he must be in a bad mood.
More examplesFewer examplesShe was an extremely unlikeable child - spoilt, bad-tempered, and always insistent on getting her own way.He's a thoroughly arrogant, self-important, essentially unlikeable man.I try and avoid shopping at the corner shop because the shopkeeper is so unlikeable.
